external_games.name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: SoI - Scenario 8 "The One-eyed Dragon"

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 8: The One-eyed Dragon
summary: An additional playable scenario, "The One-eyed Dragon". This scenario centers around the bold and ambitious One-Eyed Dragon, Masamune Date, and his heroic gamble to seize control of the land. This is a story of passion and unbridled ambition.
